Class ClientInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClientInstance

  • class ClientInstance
extends java.lang.Object
    The client instance class which initialises and manages the socket connection to the server

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientInstance

        public ClientInstance(java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String colour)
        The client instance constructor
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the player that's displayed to other users while in a game
        colour - the unique colour identifier of the user, provided by the server upon connection

      • ClientInstance

        public ClientInstance()
        The default constructor of the client instance object

      • run

        Main runnable method for the thread

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String serverAddress,
                    java.lang.String password)
        Method to connect client to server
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - the IP address and port of the server that the program wants to connect to
        password - the password the user has provided, this will be checked against the server password upon connection

      • sendServerMessage

        public void sendServerMessage(java.lang.String msg)
        Send a single message to the server
        Parameters:
        msg - the string message to be sent to the server
